fullText: This exquisite musical, based on the 2007 Israeli film of the same name, is a work of such delicate beauty and emotional intelligence that it seems to have been breathed into existence rather than constructed.
dtliExcerpt: This exquisite musical, based on the 2007 Israeli film of the same name, is a work of such delicate beauty and emotional intelligence that it seems to have been breathed into existence rather than constructed.
bwwExcerpt: The set's a bit grander and the music sounds richer, but success hasn't spoiled this embraceable musical fable about the surprising friendships that bloom in the middle of a political desert. In this Broadway transfer of an Off Broadway hit, human error sends an Egyptian military band to a depressed Israeli outpost in a desert wasteland - and human connections bring Arabs and Israelis together on common ground.
